CustomField.formula: IF(TEXT(StageName)='Proposal Opportunity', 'PO', IF(TEXT(StageName)='Proposal Submitted', 'PS', IF(TEXT(StageName)='Contract Win', 'CR', IF(TEXT(StageName)='Verbal Win', 'CV', IF(TEXT(StageName)='Decline to Bid', 'DB', IF(TEXT(StageName)='Lost', 'LO', NULL))))))
CustomField.label: AV Stage Conversion
